channel.title: Conflicts on Script Adults
channel.description: Recent content in Conflicts on Script Adults

item.title: Asymmetry of opportunity cost
item.description: This is somewhat a sequel of the previous post about the game played between the jerks and the normal people. This post is closely related since the exploitation of asymmetry of opportunity cost is a generalization of the issues we discussed in the previous post. However this post focuses more on conflicts resolution, not necessarily related to ethics. The order of sections in this post does not follow a strict waterfall model.
